channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A realtor said she’d take out an ad to help me rent my New York City apartment. Am I now morally obligated to use her?
item.description: “Other agents know our apartment is available for rent and now want to show it.”

item.title: GPT-4o: OpenAI’s shield against $40B deepfake threat to enterprises
item.description: Identifying potential deepfake multimodal content is one of the benefits of OpenAI's design decisions that together define GPT-4o.

item.title: Why are nonprofit employee credit unions spending members’ money on stadium naming rights?
item.description: If nonprofit credit unions act like big commercial banks, they should be regulated like them.

item.title: How open-source LLMs enable security teams to stay ahead of evolving threats
item.description: Open-source LLMs are revolutionizing cybersecurity, serving as a strong catalyst for increasing innovation.

item.title: Meta enters AI video wars with powerful Movie Gen set to hit Instagram in 2025
item.description: It can make both video and audio from text prompts, and allow users to customize their own videos, adding special effects, props, costumes.
